name: RoadRunner (itch) (KalDEV)
description:
This is my first game!

In this little arcade game you control a car on a endless high way. But be careful! You're not the only driver on this road so watch out.  Try to beat your own high score and just have fun!

Currently, there aren't many different cars on this road and the road segments aren't that different, but I've planned for later updates to create even more segments.

The music is from the YouTube Audio Library.
